title: Drawing, "Project for a fountain", 1800–25
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray and blue wash, traces of graphite, on off-white laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: A statue of Neptune stands in a niche which is flanked by narrow wall panels. The water pours from a dolphin. The plan underneath shows that the wall with the niche stands between two water basins, in front and in the rear. Underneath: the scale, "Dodeci Palmi Romani".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a fountain", 1800–25.
1800–25. Pen and black ink, brush and gray and blue wash, traces of graphite, on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-386.
